response.original_title: J'fais Du Porno Et J'aime Ça
response.overview: Translated as "I Make Porn and I Love It", this is the first film by director Murielle Scherre, who later won Best Director at the 2009 Feminist Porn Awards for her collaboration with Jennifer Lyon Bell: Skin. Like. Sun. Thrill in Scherre's thoroughly positive, bubbly, carnal take on sex - as fresh and innovative as her lingerie line La Fille D'O.
response.title: J'fais Du Porno Et J'aime Ça
